select t1.id , t1.tt_project_name , t1.chief_engineer , t1.project_director , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.reply_name , t1.project_no , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 , t1.remarks from assets_tech_transform_project t1
and t1.ID =#{bean.id}
and t1.TT_PROJECT_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ttProjectName}),'%')
and t1.CHIEF_ENGINEER like concat(concat('%',#{bean.chiefEngineer}),'%')
and t1.PROJECT_DIRECTOR like concat(concat('%',#{bean.projectDirector}),'%')

and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateIp}),'%')
and t1.VERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.version}),'%')
and t1.REPLY_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.replyName}),'%')
and t1.PROJECT_NO like concat(concat('%',#{bean.projectNo}),'%')

and t1.ATTRIBUTE_04 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute04}),'%')

and t1.ATTRIBUTE_30 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute30}),'%')
and t1.REMARKS like concat(concat('%',#{bean.remarks}),'%')
order by ${pOrderBy}
